    • Method Detail

      • signUp

        public boolean signUp​(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password)
               throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
        Registers a new user
        Specified by:
        signUp in interface UserManagerAPI
        Parameters:
        username - the user username
        password - the user password
        Returns:
        true if has been possibile to register the user (username not registered yet) false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if username is null or password is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if username contains the file separator character
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a RMI communication error occurs

      • logIn

        public User logIn​(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws InexistentUserException,
                  AlreadyLoggedException
        Logs in an user
        Parameters:
        username - the user username
        password - the user password
        Returns:
        the user, if has been possible to perform the log in null if the password was wrong
        Throws:
        InexistentUserException - if the user doesn't exist
        AlreadyLoggedException - if the user is already logged

      • get

        public User get​(java.lang.String username)
        Returns an user
        Parameters:
        username - the user username
        Returns:
        the user with that username, if exists null otherwise
